slashCommands.name: edit
slashCommands.description: Edit code in the current file

customCommands.name: homelab-deploy
customCommands.description: Help deploy a service to homelab K3s cluster
customCommands.prompt: You are helping deploy a service to a K3s homelab cluster. The cluster uses Longhorn for storage, Traefik for ingress, cert-manager for TLS, and Prometheus for monitoring. Generate appropriate Kubernetes manifests following homelab best practices.

customCommands.name: terraform-module
customCommands.description: Create a Terraform module for Proxmox
customCommands.prompt: Create a Terraform module for provisioning resources on Proxmox VE. Follow best practices with proper variable validation, outputs, and documentation. Use the Telmate/proxmox provider.

customCommands.name: ansible-role
customCommands.prompt: Generate an Ansible role following best practices. Include proper role structure (tasks, handlers, defaults, vars, templates, files), idempotent tasks, and comprehensive documentation.
